column17:
Give your little one the peppy look she deserves with this cute half sleeves baby jacket by People. The design consists of high neck and buttoned front along with welt pockets. The floral prints and the pink colour tone brings you an endearing look. Made from quality cotton this jacket soothes your kids all the while thereby allowing her to deal with winters without any hassle.

Style Tip
Put on with baby frock and shoes for a complete look.

Material and Care
Made of cotton
Do not bleach or dry clean
Wash with like colours
Line Dry
